CONTACT THE TALK SHOWS

Send comments, questions, suggestions, etc. about this page to Sue Trowbridge. My address is on the FAQ page. Before you write, please read the FAQ!

Important Note: I am not connected in any way with the producers or stars of any late night talk show. Also, I have no idea when your favorite star might be appearing on a show, so please don't ask me; just keep checking this page. If you wish to contact a late night talk show or host, please do so directly. (Unfortunately, few shows have public email addresses these days.)

Want to see a show in person? Click on the "Tapes in L.A." or "Tapes in N.Y." links below to find out how to get tickets.

Jimmy Kimmel Live: Contact via Facebook or Instagram - Tapes in L.A.

The Tonight Show starring Jimmy Fallon: Contact via Facebook or Instagram - Tapes in N.Y.

The Late Show with Stephen Colbert: Contact via Facebook or Instagram - Tapes in N.Y.

After Midnight: Contact via Facebook or Instagram - Tapes in L.A.

Late Night with Seth Meyers: Contact via Facebook or Instagram - Tapes in N.Y.

Watch What Happens Live: Contact via Facebook or Twitter - Tapes in N.Y.

The Daily Show: Contact via Facebook or Twitter - Tapes in N.Y.

Real Time with Bill Maher: Contact via Facebook - Tapes in L.A.

URLS

Believe it or not, this web site predates every single official network talk show page! I've been supplying late night line-ups to the Internet community since 1994, first to USENET and now on the web. The Late Night TV Page is visited by over 5,000 people every day.

The official talk show web sites:

Jimmy Kimmel Live

The Tonight Show starring Jimmy Fallon

The Late Show with Stephen Colbert

After Midnight

Late Night with Seth Meyers

Watch What Happens Live

Real Time with Bill Maher

This page brought to you by interbridge.com
